description: HTML file that includes JavaScript code defining a Calculator class extending a Service, and code for initializing and registering a service instance with a service manager.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A client-side JavaScript class extending Service, providing add and sub methods for remote procedure calls.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds an array of numbers, logs the operation, and returns a Promise resolving to the sum.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts the second number from the first, logs the operation, and returns a Promise resolving to the difference.
